title: Set primary site URL to prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz (no www) and remove draft URL references

requirements.text: Update the app’s primary site URL configuration to use exactly "https://prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz/" (no "www") and ensure the application does not display or reference the draft URL "https://significant-blush-1gq-draft.caffeine.xyz/" or the "https://www.prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz" variant anywhere in user-facing UI copy, links intended to represent the site’s primary URL, or metadata derived from SITE_CONFIG.

quotes: change the URL from this "https://significant-blush-1gq-draft.caffeine.xyz/" to this "https://prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz/"  build

Your site is already configured to use the URL:
https://www.prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz

...Do you want me to push the current draft live so the main URL becomes prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz?

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/config/site.ts sets SITE_CONFIG.url to exactly "https://prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz" (no www).
A project-wide search finds no occurrences of "significant-blush-1gq-draft.caffeine.xyz" in frontend source code or user-facing text.
A project-wide search finds no occurrences of "https://www.prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz" used as the primary site URL in frontend source code or user-facing text.
Any UI element or link that intentionally represents the site’s primary URL (if present) uses "https://prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz".

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services/canisters).
nonGoals: Implementing DNS changes, SSL, or platform deployment actions (e.g., "Push Live") beyond updating the app’s code/configuration.
Adding new pages or features unrelated to site URL configuration.
